root: ^The external functions GetPersistedBool(name) and SetPersistedBool(name,value) can be used to interact with the persistence system.
^This is useful to share values between different stories or to change the rest of the game depending on choices made in Ink.
^There are also variants of the method for Int, Float and String values.

getChoice: ^For example this choice will be persisted to a value that is observed by a PersistenceTrigger?
